snippet.title: Wandersong OFFICIAL LAUNCH TRAILER! :D
snippet.description:
WANDERSONG IS HERE!

We're so excited to share our goofy musical adventure with the world! :D Play it today on your favorite PC, Mac or Nintendo Switch!

The song from this trailer is called Moonscape, you can get it here! https://ashellinthepit.bandcamp.com/track/moonscape

MORE LINKS
Web: http://wanderso.ng
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/530320/Wandersong/
Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/wandersong-switch

CREDITS===============
Em Halberstadt (https://twitter.com/emaudible) concepted and edited the trailer. and did the audio. She also did all the sound design for the game itself!
my2k (https://twitter.com/my2k) pitched the animation idea and did all 3D animation!
Alexis Dean-Jones (https://twitter.com/musclewing) did 2D animation for the bird!
Daniel Ocean (https://twitter.com/Oceanthebard) created the Bard model & rig
Steve Pettit (https://twitter.com/SPace_bit) did additional work on the rig
Diego de la Rocha (https://twitter.com/diegodelarocha) did final rig adjustments, supervised the storyboards and gave moral support 💖
Gordon McGladdery (https://twitter.com/AShellinthePit) composed the game soundtrack & created the song edit for this trailer
Greg Lobanov (https://twitter.com/theBanov) made the game and directed/storyboarded the trailer!

Fun fact, these 15 seconds of animation took a team that was more than 2x the team that made the entire game. LOL
